@shan_alberta The ONLY shot we have of putting electoral reform back on the map requires kicking up a big enough fuss that JT must respond.
@shan_alberta Encourage others to do the same. It may sound like a lot of work, but it's actually not.
@beynate Ask them to have his back, especially in caucus. Ask them directly where they stand on electoral reform.
@shan_alberta 3) Call AS MANY Liberal MPs as you can. Start with the one in your riding or closest to you. Tell them you stand with @beynate
@shan_alberta 2) Call Erskine-Smith's office (416-467-0860) and thank him for doing this. Tell him you've got his back.
